text:
(18+ only please!)

Honestly?? I just want to make these cute NEETs suffer through extreme bondage kinks, like bitchsuits and mummification and being treating like a sex toy. Most kinks below are optional but I'd love you forever if you could indulge me in my rarer kinks.

My kinks include heavy bondage, shibari, struggling/thrashing, gags (!!!), bitchsuits (!!), suspension bondage, nipple clamps, begging, toys, double/triple penetration, humiliation, degradation, crying, recording, blindfolds, latex, public use, spanking, mummification bondage, orgasm denial, fucking machines, overstimulation, drool/saliva, electricity, cock milking, breathplay, and likely more! Hard no's are are anything unsanitary, gore, vore, pregnancy, bestiality, or death.
This sounds fantastic!
(( glad you think so! who were you thinking of playing, and what kinks are you cool with?

I actually love everything you have listed with a particular weakness for gags, clamps, mummification, public use, and electricity. And I’m pretty sure I could handle all the brothers unless you wanted one specifically.
(( awesome! I'm cool with any/all brothers, if you could play them all that would be great!

Consider it done then!

Which mostly means we need to work out a scenario of some kind

(( alright! maybe the Matsus get kidnapped by some sort of collector/trainer who runs some sort of porn business and records them in humiliating situations. When they're not being recorded, he puts them on display around his house like furniture, occasionally hosting parties and allows guests to play with them

Oh that sounds really neat!

Put through their paces on set for the videos, possibly online streaming so it’s immediately viewed by people and they get to view the whole training process. Special episodes for holidays maybe?

And just when they think they’re done they’re put into even more bondage and fashioned into different pieces of furniture.

(( nice thinking! for different holidays, the boys could be in different outfits, such as being reindeer for Christmas and pulling a sled attached to them through nipple clamps.

The bondage for furniture is really restrictive too. One idea I had was a blowjob training mechanism that the victim is strapped to that forces them to have a dildo in their mouth. If they don't practice fast or well enough, they get shocked.

One of them could also play the role of Christmas tree, impaled on a vibrator and decorated with clip ornaments.

That sounds awesome too!
(( sounds great! maybe give a few of them different roles? also the tree could be shocked through the clip ornaments from time to time
Oh definitely! I like the sound of all of that
(( thanks!
(( what if he also stored them away in mummified states in some kind of sack as punishment for bad behavior?
That’s awesome! Especially at home and then when it was time for a new episode they’d be punished even more harshly

(( I'm loving your ideas! if you get any more I'd love to hear them.

anything else we need to discuss?

I’ll keep you updated as long as you do the same.

And I think we’re ready to start? Probably on their first episode after capture when the process begins?
(( sure! right off the bat, they'd be recorded? that works for me!
It’d definitely make the initial humiliation worse since they wouldn’t be in their gear and viewers would see their faces
(( yeah! would the gear for future episodes be like latex/leather, and the occasionally themed sexy outfit?

I think so yeah. I really like the idea of them always being in tight, rubber masks without the lower half for the mouth so they can be gagged in different ways but the mask color corresponds to a different viewer but the brothers are never able to see what’s coming next no matter where they are

(( wow, that's a hot idea! they'd be truly helpless, with muffled hearing and absolutely no sight. turned into rubber dolls with no way to defend themselves~

maybe they could be put in special outfits sometimes, like nurse/cheerleader outfits depending on what the viewers vote on
That sounds great! So much is interchangeable depending on whether they’re at their new home or being filmed but I think that the masks are a must have.
(( absolutely! I'm ready to write the starter if there's nothing else to discuss
Go for it!
